name: Infectious Claws
description: Shred enemies in front of you with your tainted claws, dealing 2178 Disease Damage and an additional 2170 Disease Damage over 10 seconds.  Enemies hit by the initial hit are afflicted with the Diseased status effect.
coefDescription: CRIMINAL ACT Shred enemies in front of you with your tainted claws, dealing $1 Disease Damage and an additional $2 Disease Damage over 10 seconds.  Enemies hit by the initial hit are afflicted with the Diseased status effect.
rawDescription:

Enemies hit by the initial hit are afflicted with the Diseased status effect.
